title: BREAKING RHONY NEWS! + RHONJ & RHOC!
itunes:title: BREAKING RHONY NEWS! + RHONJ & RHOC!
description:
NEWS ALERT: RHONY is being split! Danny breaks down the breaking Real Housewives of New York News, then recaps this week's The Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a ropes course and Snickers Coffee-Mate! Over on The Real Housewives of Orange County, Casita launches her skincare.


RHOC: 42:00ish


BOOK: smarturl.it/unremember


YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1


Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino


Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
